author: Soull Pepe
comment: Has been a life saver multiple times at the register when I over spent and needed to transfer funds from another account to cover what I was spending. Transfers are instant and so easy! I don't know what took so long I literally waited years for this function but they finally added a memo option to the transfer section so that you can notate what you're transferring money for an absolute necessity for me, now I don't have to use my phone to log on to the actual website to do that and I can leave a memo every time to help me keep track of exactly what I pulled money For. Thanks Wright-Patt.

author: Sarah Easley
comment: Great service! The only thing I don't care for is the pop up that sometimes appears, blocking the view of the transaction confirmation number. It is  convenient to use  overall and the recent upgrade is working well ,making  electronic deposits easy and fast from my android.

author: George ficade
comment: When trying to submit checks, always takes 12-15 attempts for the back of the checks. Software needs work. Bill pay has created problems despite trying to pay even earlier. 3/5 max rating until you improve.

author: Zak Kelly
comment: Anyone saying they have never had a problem with this app is LYING. Half the time it comes up with an Application Error upon opening. The other half of the time it waits to tell you that until you enter your login. If I could give -5 stars, I would. Time to look into Chase banking.

author: Kim Boyd
comment: When it works, it's great. Unfortunately, it seems as if every time I REALLY need it, I get an error message that says "We cannot display your information at this time. Please try again later." Overall, it's easy and convenient, just not 100% reliable.

author: Clancy Girl
comment: I wish this app had 2 things - to be able to look at the history of bill payments. I was told it is not available on the mobile app and history of payment on bills can only be accessed and seen on a computer. Doesn't make sense.  2nd - I wish you had pattern (making a pattern on dots like my Capital One account has) entry to your account vs always typing in a password. Much easier and convenient. If you had these 2 things, I would give this app a 5 star rating.

author: James Johns
comment: The app says and pictures are displayed of business and personal accts all in the same app. I downloaded the app got all the personal to show but my business wont show. They now say i have to. Login threw a different login to view my business...bad advertisements

author: Mike Miller
comment: Love this app but the check deposit feature isn't working correctly.  The front image works great but when you go to take the image of the back of the check, it takes some weird distorted picture and then keeps making you take another picture!  Please fix this problem!!

author: Nick Howe
comment: Tried the app on multiple devices, the camera does not focus correctly and cause the app to be frustrating and annoying.. better off running to the atm for deposits.

This app is incredibly convenient and easy to navigate. It makes banking and being semi-responsible with money possible for even the most careless of people. Wright-Patt is a great place to bank through. Thanks guys.

author: Kellie Hamilton
comment: I love this app and Wright Patt!! It is user friendly, depositing checks is a breeze as well as transfers from accounts. This credit union is #1 and I wish we had switched a long time ago!!!!

author: Nicholas Rowland
comment: Good app to keep up with payments pending and paid. Only thing I can think to better the app is for a time of day along with the date when a purchase was made. Date is there, time is not

I've been using this app for 4 months.  I use it to check my balance, monitor account activity, and transfer funds. It's easy to use, and I haven't had any problems, so far.  Very convenient and a time saver.

author: Alex Blair
comment: This is altogether a great app for a great bank. I've had this app for a long time and it keeps getting better and better with each additional feature/update they apply.

author: Shannon Hamblin
comment: I'm not to knowledgeable about this app but for the little I do know about it, it works great. I love that you can take pictures of your check with your phone and submit your check into your bank account.

author: Deboarah Pope
comment: This is the easiest  banking app ever its very well done. I really appreciate the ease of transfers when you're in a pinch. And now you can transfer money and how it calls your phone to make sure its you is a good idea.

author: David Moore
comment: Secure for peace of mind, formatted for ease of use, and literally a one-stop shop for all your online banking management needs.  Security is a bit tight from time-to-time using a second layer of verification by phone or email in addition to password access, especially if accessing from new device. Overall, this app makes banking a lot easier, more convenient, and security is again, peace of mind in a trusted brand.

author: Rick Vance
comment: Easy to use and no crashes so far. When transferring funds to make cc payment or mortgage payment, it would be nice if the amount due appeared like it does on the Web version.

author: Scottie
comment: I think this app is a great tool for what I need. I can manage my accounts and transfer within them without a problem. There are limits to how many transfers you can make monthly by app, but I really enjoy having the access to move my money around at the push of a button. I also feel like it is a secure means of banking, at least in my opinion.

author: Crystal Marie
comment: To deposit my checks it takes about 10 retakes.  Its awful compared to other people who use a different bank service.  Needs fixed , it's terrible!

author: Zeriga Persona
comment: Crashes sometimes, but it works when you need it. (After a quick retry...)
Great bank, great app. You will not find better customer service in the banking industry!

author: Josseline Marie Gonzalez Sierra
comment: Pretty good app, however I dont know if its the app or the bank system sometimes the payments are not taken till a few days later making it hard to keep track on what you really have.

author: A Google User
comment: The recent updates are nice additions to the functionality. The mobile deposit has improved greatly since I first installed the app in 2014.

author: keith neff
comment: Has everything you'd expect in a banking app. The atm finder has led me to atms that don't accept cash deposits.
I wish large withdrawal notices were same day if not instantaneous.  Not very  useful a day or two later. Otherwise I like it

author: Angela Roe
comment: Love that it was so easy to transfer and is so easy to track transactions! They really do keep tabs on your activity...making sure that you are the one making the transactions! Which I happen to appreciate....love it.

author: Robyn Bone
comment: The app is as awesome as wright patt. The only thing I don't like is the limit on transfers
title: Love it

author: Anthony Otey
comment: I love it because I don't have to go inside the credit union if it's crowded I can transfer money from  My other accounts if I fall short of Cash in seconds

author: Muhire Kavuna
comment: This app works great! The only problem I had was during setup. I had a great time passing verification
This is a good app. I wish it could allow us to transfer $ to external bank accounts (via Popmoney like we can on WPCU's online banking website).

author: Jerald Zwiesler
comment: I have been with WPCU for over 20 years and they never stop amazing me.

author: Fannie Wilson
comment: Love the app I had a problem with the old app I uninstalled and reinstalled the new app, no problem. Keep up the good work.

author: William Roeser
comment: Worked great until just recently.  It is taking multiple attempts to perform transactions.

author: Patricia Casey
comment: This is a great app. I appreciate all of the thought that went into designing it. It takes mobile banking to a whole new level. Literally all of my account information is available at the touch of a finger.

author: rwtholtzclaw
comment: As always Credit Unions offer better service than banks. But WP has went beyond and us competing with tech as well as service. Great app for Banking!

author: Bertha Dehart
comment: It's the best bank app I've ever used.  It is simple and user friendly. You don't have to search and hunt for everything or try to figure out what it is called.

author: Jonathan Codispoti
comment: The check deposit is not very well done. Needs updated

author: Scott Rathje
comment: Have used this app on multiple Galaxy devices and (except for the scan/check deposit feature) has always worked consistently and great!

author: Susan Woody
comment: Love this app!  I can pay bills, make mobile deposits and make transfers.  It is so easy!
